generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and construction barriers.
- building: Several buildings are visible along the street, including one with scaffolding on the left and another with a stone facade on the right.
- fence: A metal fence with red and white barriers is present on the right side of the road, likely for construction or safety.
- pole: Traffic light poles are visible above the road, supporting the traffic signals.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible above the road, showing red lights.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with an upward arrow is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees line both sides of the road, providing shade and greenery.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible along the edges of the road, particularly on the left side.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A silver car is visible ahead on the road, driving away from the camera.
- truck: A white truck is visible on the left side of the road, parked or moving slowly.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
